DataElement.preferredName: AYA-HEARS Past One Month How Much Did Ringing, Buzzing, Whistling Noises Interfere with Your Daily Activities Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation in the past one month, how much ringing, buzzing, or whistling noises interfered with their daily activities, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: AYA-HEARS Past 30 Days How Much Did Ringing, Buzzing, Whistling Noises Interfere with Your Daily Activities Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure hearing loss or problems experienced by patients who have received treatment for cancer._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about how much an individual's daily activities were interfered with by ringing, buzzing, or whistling noises._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure hearing loss or problems experienced by patients who have received treatment for cancer.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire designed to measure hearing loss or problems experienced by patients who have received treatment for cancer.

Property.preferredName: Past 30 Days How Much Did Ringing, Buzzing, Whistling Noises Interfere with Your Daily Activities Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.:A question about how much an individual's daily activities were interfered with by ringing, buzzing, or whistling noises.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.

Concepts.longName: How Much Did Ringing, Buzzing, Whistling Noises Interfere with Your Daily Activities
Concepts.definition: A question about how much an individual's daily activities were interfered with by ringing, buzzing, or whistling noises.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: AYA-HEARS: Adolescent and Young Adult Hearing Screen, Version 1.0. Abby Rosenberg, Lillian Sung, Donna Lynn Johnston, Lindsey Frazier, 2016

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a great amount or extent.

PermissibleValues.value: Did not hear ringing or other noises OR ringing or other noises did not interfere with activities
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Did Not Hear Ringing or Other Noises Or Ringing or Other Noises Did Not Interfere with Activities

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Did Not Hear Ringing or Other Noises Or Ringing or Other Noises Did Not Interfere with Activities
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual did not hear ringing or other noises.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: A response indicating that ringing or other noises did not interfere with an individual's activities.

Concepts.longName: Did Not Hear Ringing or Other Noises
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual did not hear ringing or other noises.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

Concepts.longName: Ringing or Other Noises Did Not Interfere with Activities
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that ringing or other noises did not interfere with an individual's activities.

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
